title: Substitute and Solve for c
text:
Substitute $$h=150$$ into one of the original equations and solve for c.
$$2h+3c=960$$
$$2	imes150+3c=960$$
$$300+3c=960$$
$$c=220$$
speech:

 300, plus 3 c is equal to 960 
 c, is equal to 220
